title: Dekatreis
description: A techno-fantasy campaign setting for the Pathfinder 2 system, created by Veilza Kinsemi.

dragonborn.label: Dragonborn
dragonborn.description: Dragonborn are draconic humanoids that typically have powerful breath weapons or wings resembling the ones of true dragons.

alepou.label: Alepou
alepou.description: Alepou are vulpine humanoids who have innately strong magical abilities stemming from their tails.

thyrosia.label: Thyrosia
thyrosia.description: Thyrosia are humans with mammal traits that can range from animal appendages to fully furred.

technological.label: Technological
technological.description: Actions and features with the technological trait are digital in nature or rely on technology to use.

magitech.label: Magitech
magitech.description: A magitech action or feature has both magical and technological traits. They are affected by any features or effects that would normally affect either magical or technological items.

network.label: Network
network.description: Actions and features with the Network trait cannot be used while outside of the range of one of a kingdom's magitech networks.

dragonborn.label: Dragonborn
dragonborn.description: Dragonborn are draconic humanoids that typically have powerful breath weapons or wings resembling the ones of true dragons.

alepou.label: Alepou
alepou.description: Alepou are vulpine humanoids who have innately strong magical abilities stemming from their tails.

technological.label: Technological
technological.description: Items with the technological trait is mechanically crafted, and are not magical in nature.

magitech.label: Magitech
magitech.description: A magitech item has both magical and technological traits. They are affected by any features or effects that would normally affect either magical or technological items.
